status.description:
Current status of the deployment. A valid value is ``COMPLETE`` ,
``IN_PROGRESS`` , or ``FAILED`` .

server_id.description: The ID of the compute server to which the configuration applies.

config_id.description:
The ID of the software configuration resource that runs when
applying to the server.

stack_user_project_id.description:
Authentication project ID, which can also perform operations on
this deployment.

action.description: The current stack action that triggers this deployment resource.

status_reason.description:
Error description for the last status change, which is ``FAILED``
status.
